posts.post_title: F/S - Dozen T206 Raw - Tolstoi, PB, more... - SOLD!
posts.post_content:
Trying to make a bit of cash to pay for a recent BST purchase.  Asking $160 delivered for the lot via check/paypal gift (add 3% otherwise).  

[IMG]http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100015/dozenLotF/web.jpg[/IMG]

Hey Erick,

If you decide to break up the lot, I can use the Tolstoi Neal Ball.

Let me know,

Thanks - Rob

I could use Doolin, Ball, Durham, Mullin, Wilson and Wiltse.  Let me know if you decide to break them up, too.  

email [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url]
I will take the Charley OLeary if you due break up... Thanks
